mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.pcode AS "pcode", a.name AS "name", a.level AS "level", a.open_status AS "openStatus"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_region( id, code, pcode, name, level, open_status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{pcode}, #{name}, #{level}, #{openStatus} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_region SET code = #{code}, pcode = #{pcode}, name = #{name}, level = #{level}, open_status = #{openStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
